original_title: The Voyages of Young Doctor Dolittle
overview: John Dolittle loves animals just like his uncle, Doctor Dolittle. When John is warned that animals are in danger, he jumps into his uncleâ€™s submarine to help. When he arrives at Dolittle Island, he learns that it has been taken over by Ramsey the Ram and his army of gorillas. With a little help from some new friends, John comes to the rescue and saves the island.
tagline: Animals make the very best of friends
title: The Voyages of Young Doctor Dolittle
